name: NSComboBoxCell
desc: The user interface of a combo box.

items.name: var hasVerticalScroller: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates if the combo box displays a vertical scroller.

items.name: var isButtonBordered: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the combo box button displays a border.

items.name: var intercellSpacing: NSSize
items.desc: The spacing between cells in the combo box’s pop-up list.

items.name: var itemHeight: CGFloat
items.desc: The height of each item in the combo box’s pop-up list.

items.name: var numberOfVisibleItems: Int
items.desc: The maximum number of items visible in the pop-up list at any one time.

items.name: var dataSource: NSComboBoxCellDataSource?
items.desc: The object that provides the data displayed in the combo box’s pop-up list.

items.name: var usesDataSource: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates if the combo box uses an external data source to populate its pop-up list.

items.name: func addItems(withObjectValues: [Any])
items.desc: Adds multiple objects to the internal item list.

items.name: func addItem(withObjectValue: Any)
items.desc: Adds the specified object to the internal item list.

items.name: func insertItem(withObjectValue: Any, at: Int)
items.desc: Inserts an object at the specified location in the internal item list.

items.name: var objectValues: [Any]
items.desc: The combo box’s internal item list in an array.

items.name: func removeAllItems()
items.desc: Removes all items from the combo box’s internal item list.

items.name: func removeItem(at: Int)
items.desc: Removes the object at the specified location from the combo box’s internal item list.

items.name: func removeItem(withObjectValue: Any)
items.desc: Removes all occurrences of the specified object from the combo box’s internal item list.

items.name: var numberOfItems: Int
items.desc: The total number of items in the pop-up list.

items.name: func indexOfItem(withObjectValue: Any) -> Int
items.desc: Searches the combo box’s internal item list for the given object and returns the matching index number.

items.name: func itemObjectValue(at: Int) -> Any
items.desc: Returns the object located at the specified location in the internal item list.

items.name: func noteNumberOfItemsChanged()
items.desc: Informs the combo box that the number of items in its data source has changed.

items.name: func reloadData()
items.desc: Marks the combo box as needing redisplay, so that it will reload the data for visible pop-up items and draw the new values.

items.name: func scrollItemAtIndexToTop(Int)
items.desc: Scrolls the combo box’s pop-up list vertically so that the item at the given index is as close to the top as possible.

items.name: func scrollItemAtIndexToVisible(Int)
items.desc: Scrolls the combo box’s pop-up list vertically so that the item at the given index is visible.

items.name: func deselectItem(at: Int)
items.desc: Deselects the pop-up list item at the given index if it’s selected.

items.name: var indexOfSelectedItem: Int
items.desc: The index of the last item selected from the pop-up list.

items.name: var objectValueOfSelectedItem: Any?
items.desc: The object corresponding to the last item selected from the pop-up list.

items.name: func selectItem(at: Int)
items.desc: Selects the pop-up list row at the given index.

items.name: func selectItem(withObjectValue: Any?)
items.desc: Selects the first pop-up list item that corresponds to the specified object.

items.name: func completedString(String) -> String?
items.desc: Returns a string from the combo box’s pop-up list that starts with the given substring.

items.name: var completes: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates if the combo box tries to complete text entered by the user.
